# Client Filters For Marketing Emails

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/client-filters-for-marketing-emails/

## Category
04 Clients

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
CAMPAIGNS
Client Filters for Email Campaigns

When creating an email campaign, you can choose to send your email to specific clients based on different filters.

Link copied
Appointment filters

You can filter your email campaign recipient list based on a client’s previous or future appointments.

To send automated marketing emails triggered by a client’s appointment or sales history, you can use the Flows app.

Filter

	

Description




With service provider

	

Clients who had a previous appointment or have a future appointment with a specific service provider. More than one service provider can be selected.




With service

	

Clients who had a previous appointment or have a future appointment for a specific service. More than one service can be selected, including services from different service categories.




With service in category

	

Clients who had a previous appointment or have a future appointment for a service in a specific service category. More than one service category can be selected.




At location

	

Clients who had a previous appointment or have a future appointment at a specific location. More than one location can be selected.




On date

	

Clients who had a previous appointment or have a future appointment on a specific date or during a specific time period.




More than [x] days ago

	

Clients whose last appointment was more than [x] days ago. Enable the Include clients with no appointments toggle to include clients who did not have any appointments during the specified time period.

Link copied
Client filters

You can filter your email campaign recipient list based on a client’s profile.

To send automated marketing emails triggered by client details such as client notes, you can use the Flows app.

Filter

	

Description




Has future appointment

	

Clients who have a future appointment booked.




Has no future appointment

	

Clients who do not have a future appointment after the current date.




Profile created on

	

Clients whose profile was created on a specific date or during a specific time period.




Had first appointment on

	

Clients whose first appointment was on a specific date or during a specific time period.




Spent more than

	

Clients who have spent more than a specific amount in total sales (including service sales and product sales).




Has membership

	

Clients who have a specific membership. More than one membership plan can be selected.




Birthday

	

Clients who have a birthday during a specific month. More than one month can be selected.




Gender

	

Clients who identify with a specific gender.




Referred by

	

Clients who were referred by a specific source.




Tag

	

Clients whose profile includes a specific tag.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
